text: Andie MacDowell (born Rosalie Anderson MacDowell on April 21, 1958 in Gaffney, South Carolina) is an American movie actress. == Personal life == From 1986 until 1999 Andie was married to Paul Qualley. They have three children, son Justin Qualley (born 1986) and two daughters Rainey Qualley (born 1989) and Sarah Margaret Qualley (born 1995). From 2001 until 2004 she was married to Rhett DeCamp Hartzog. ==Movies== * Mighty Fine (2012) * Barnyard (2006) * Tara Road (2005) * Beauty Shop (2005) * Dinner with Friends (2001) * Crush (2001) * Harrison's Flowers (2000) * The End of Violence (1997) * Muppets from Space (1999) * Multiplicity (1996) * Michael (1996) * Unstrung Heroes (1995) * Bad Girls (1994) * Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994) * Short Cuts (1993) * Groundhog Day (1993) * The Player (1992) * The Object of Beauty (1991) * Hudson Hawk (1991) * Green Card (1990) * sex, lies, and videotape (1989) * St. Elmo's Fire (1985) * Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes (1984) ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from South Carolina Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Andie MacDowell
